title: What is Meta Gate?
content: &nbsp&nbsp- Meta Gate is an admin tool to search / register / manage claim topics & achievements. Meta Gate is open to any participants of Metadium platform, but functions to register new claim topics & achievements are currently limited to registered AAs.

title: What is Claim / Achievement?
content:
- Claim is a proof of identity attributes that improve reliability of identity data online.
    AAs can verify the authenticity of user data on its own way, and issue claim for it upon user's request.
    > ex)Crypto-exchange can issue claims of their user including,
         + User's Phone No. has been verified
         + User's E-mail has been verified
         + User is level 2 in certain exchange

  - Achievement is a reward mechanism triggered by claims designed to incentivize users to onboard onto and fully experience the service.
    It helps to acquire valuable claims on platform.
    > ex) Game publisher can set up achievement for user to accomplish 100 hours of playtime and give 50 META as a reward.

title: What is Topic?
content:
- Topic is a pre-defined category of data required to file a claim.
    Topic of certain data needs to be registered prior to issue a claim.
   > ex) Topic 'User Level on Crypto-Exchange' needs to be registered for a crypto-exchange to issue claim on user level data of a user.

title: How do I register an AA?
content:
- In the current stage, for testnet, AA can only be registered by Metadium.
    Please contact Metadium (contact@metadium.com) with request to be registered as one.

title: How do I add a Topic?
content:
- Once registered as an AA, you can go to 'Topic Registry' Tab and add a new Topic.
    1) Go to Topic Registry Tab
    2) Click on Add New Topic button on top-left
    3) Input Title / Explanation (max. 32bytes)
    4) Click on Add button
    5) Scan QR Code with Meta ID App
    6) Authenticate via Biometric or PIN No.
    7) New Topic Added
  * Adding new topic cost transaction fee. Please make sure you have enough deposit of META Token before proceed.

title: How do I add an Achievement?
content:
- Once registered as an AA, you can go to 'Achievement Registry' Tab and add a new Achievement.
    1) Go to Achievement Registry Tab
    2) Click on Add New Achievement button on top-left
    3) Input Title / Explanation (max. 32bytes) / Reward (Minimum 5 META) / Required claim topic with issuer
    4) Click on Add button
    5) Scan QR Code with Meta ID App
    6) Authenticate via Biometric or PIN No.
    7) New Achievement Added
    8) Charge balance of the achievement
  * Adding new achievement cost transaction fee. Please make sure you have enough deposit of META Token before proceed.
  * Achievement won't be visible for users until sufficient balance of the achievement has been charged.

title: How do I add balance to an Achievement?
content:
- Check the address of achievement at 'Achievement Registry' > 'Detail of Achievement'.
    Send META to achievement address.
